level.heading: Rules and regulations.
level.text: ยง 20-391 Rules and regulations. The commissioner may make such rules and regulations not inconsistent with the provisions of this subchapter, as may be necessary with respect to the form and content of applications for licenses, the reception thereof, the investigation and examination of applicants and their qualifications, and the other matters incidental or appropriate to his or her powers and duties as prescribed by this subchapter and for the proper administration and enforcement of the provisions of this subchapter, and to amend or repeal any such rules and regulations.
